title: Personalized Learning Strategy Design Based on Educational Feedback Network Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Learning Analytics and Understanding of Graph Theory
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen language learning and educational feedback analysis capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners visualize learning interaction data as graph network models to analyze feedback flow.
Learners predict personalized feedback patterns using LSTM-based time-series analysis.
Core learning nodes (influencers) can be identified by applying network centrality metrics (degree, betweenness centrality).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
